name: AXChartDescriptor
desc: An object that contains all the semantic information about an accessible chart.

items.name: init(title: String?, summary: String?, xAxis: AXDataAxisDescriptor, yAxis: AXNumericDataAxisDescriptor?, additionalAxes: [AXDataAxisDescriptor], series: [AXDataSeriesDescriptor])
items.desc: Creates a chart descriptor with the specified title, summary, X-axis descriptor, Y-axis descriptor, descriptors for additional axes, and array of data series.

items.name: init(attributedTitle: NSAttributedString?, summary: String?, xAxis: AXDataAxisDescriptor, yAxis: AXNumericDataAxisDescriptor?, additionalAxes: [AXDataAxisDescriptor], series: [AXDataSeriesDescriptor])
items.desc: Creates a chart descriptor with the specified attributed title, summary, X-axis descriptor, Y-axis descriptor, descriptors for additional axes, and array of data series.

items.name: var attributedTitle: NSAttributedString?
items.desc: An attributed version of the chart title.

items.name: var summary: String?
items.desc: A description of the key takeaways or features of the chart.

items.name: var xAxis: AXDataAxisDescriptor
items.desc: The axis descriptor for the chart’s X-axis.

items.name: var yAxis: AXNumericDataAxisDescriptor?
items.desc: The axis descriptor for the chart’s Y-axis.

items.name: var additionalAxes: [AXDataAxisDescriptor]
items.desc: The descriptors for additional categorical or numerical axes beyond the X-axis and Y-axis.

items.name: protocol AXDataAxisDescriptor
items.desc: The basic interface for a data axis in a chart.

items.name: var series: [AXDataSeriesDescriptor]
items.desc: The descriptors for each data series in the chart.

items.name: class AXDataSeriesDescriptor
items.desc: An object that represents a series of data points.

items.name: var contentFrame: CGRect
items.desc: The bounds of the view, in screen coordinates, for visually rendering data values.

items.name: var contentDirection: AXChartDescriptor.ContentDirection
items.desc: The direction of the content in the chart.

items.name: enum AXChartDescriptor.ContentDirection
items.desc: A constant that describes the content direction of the chart.
